program main

    implicit none

    integer(8) :: n_in, count, temp, M, i_char, n
    character(len=20) :: s
    integer(8), allocatable :: dp(:,:)

    ! Read input
    read(*,*) n_in

    ! Compute count of 1 bits
    count = 0
    temp = n_in
    do while (temp > 0)
        count = count + mod(temp, 2)
        temp = temp / 2
    end do

    ! Convert count to string
    write(s, '(i0)') count
    s = adjustl(s)
    n = len_trim(s)

    ! Allocate DP array
    allocate( dp(0:n, 0:1) )
    dp = 0
    dp(0,0) = 1

    M = 1000000007

    ! Process each character
    do i_char = 1, n
        character(1) :: current_char
        current_char = s(i_char:i_char)

        ! First part
        if (current_char == '0') then
            dp(i_char,0) = dp(i_char-1,0)
            dp(i_char,1) = dp(i_char-1,1)
        else
            dp(i_char,1) = mod( dp(i_char-1,0) + dp(i_char-1,1), M )
        end if

        ! Second part
        if (current_char == '0') then
            temp = mod( 2 * dp(i_char-1,1), M )
            dp(i_char,1) = mod( dp(i_char,1) + temp, M )
        else
            temp = mod( 2 * dp(i_char-1,0), M )
            dp(i_char,0) = mod( dp(i_char,0) + temp, M )
            temp = mod( 2 * dp(i_char-1,1), M )
            dp(i_char,1) = mod( dp(i_char,1) + temp, M )
        end if
    end do

    ! Compute result
    integer(8) :: result
    result = mod( dp(n,0) + dp(n,1), M )
    print *, result

    deallocate(dp)

end program main
